name: Lion King Simulator
description:
What can be more precious than family? Well, the lions are on the same opinion.

In this hunting simulator, you will play the role of a predator who is looking for food for himself and his family. As a lion, you are armed with skills that will come in handy when stalking an innocent zebra. Use your talent to walk like a cat, to be unnoticeable when it comes to attacking, otherwise, you risk losing your prey and not taking anything to your hungry kids.

You don't have a choice, you can't return home with nothing... Watch out !

Game features :
- 10 levels
- Predators that hunt you (elephants, rhinos, crocodiles)
- A family of hungry ions
